tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE KYC_Compliance (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    customer_address VARCHAR(255),
    kyc_status VARCHAR(50),
    compliance_record TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE kyc_information (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    address VARCHAR(255),
    kyc_status BOOL
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    date_time TIMESTAMP,
    event_description TEXT,
    compliance_status BOOL
);

CREATE TABLE kyc_information (
  kyc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  date_of_birth DATE,
  nationality VARCHAR(50),
  address VARCHAR(255),
  created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  kyc_id INT NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  issue_date DATE,
  notes TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  record_id INT NOT NULL,
  report_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  reporting_date DATE,
  report_content TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE kyc_information (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(255),
  address VARCHAR(255),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  kyc_verified BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  record_type VARCHAR(50),
  record_description TEXT,
  record_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES kyc_information(user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_type VARCHAR(50),
  report_date DATE,
  creator_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (creator_id) REFERENCES kyc_information(user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE user_activity_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  activity_description TEXT,
  activity_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES kyc_information(user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE kyc_information (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    dob DATE,
    address TEXT,
    kyc_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_records (
    record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    record_date DATE NOT NULL,
    details TEXT,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
);
